attributes.action: join the UNIFEM campaign on violence against women and legislate for tougher sentences on indecency offence and groping in public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Actress Nicole Kidman, is reported on AOL today to promote UNIFEM's "Say NO to Violence Against Women campaign". In accordance with new reviews of sentences for rapists, the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to make tougher fines and sentences please for individuals who take the liberty of indecently and inappropriately assaulting women - in an age of rising breast cancer surgery, this is not only humiliating, but a very dangerous practise.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
